Option.Name: Deflect off of map and object collisions

knockbackDist.Wiki: If attack will stun, distance victim travels in "meters"\nIf attack will not stun, distance attacker travels backwards in "meters" (needs testing)

spEffectId0.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to victims of this attack.\nAttacks used for bullets must use the spEffectId fields present in bullet parameters

spEffectId1.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to victims of this attack.\nAttacks used for bullets must use the spEffectId fields present in bullet parameters

spEffectId2.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to victims of this attack.\nAttacks used for bullets must use the spEffectId fields present in bullet parameters

spEffectId3.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to victims of this attack.\nAttacks used for bullets must use the spEffectId fields present in bullet parameters

spEffectId4.Wiki: spEffectParam to apply to victims of this attack.\nAttacks used for bullets must use the spEffectId fields present in bullet parameters

hit0_DmyPoly1.Wiki: ID of first dummypoly location to use for hitbox 0 (1st). DmyPoly2 fields can be used to define a second point for hitboxes, creating a hitbox capsule

hit1_DmyPoly1.Wiki: ID of first dummypoly location to use for hitbox 1 (2nd). DmyPoly2 fields can be used to define a second point for hitboxes, creating a hitbox capsule

hit2_DmyPoly1.Wiki: ID of first dummypoly location to use for hitbox 2 (3rd). DmyPoly2 fields can be used to define a second point for hitboxes, creating a hitbox capsule

hit3_DmyPoly1.Wiki: ID of first dummypoly location to use for hitbox 3 (4th). DmyPoly2 fields can be used to define a second point for hitboxes, creating a hitbox capsule

hit0_DmyPoly2.Wiki: ID of second dummypoly location to use for hitbox 0 (1st). If -1, only DmyPoly1 will be used for the hitbox, making the hitbox a sphere

hit1_DmyPoly2.Wiki: ID of second dummypoly location to use for hitbox 1 (2nd). If -1, only DmyPoly1 will be used for the hitbox, making the hitbox a sphere

hit2_DmyPoly2.Wiki: ID of second dummypoly location to use for hitbox 2 (3rd). If -1, only DmyPoly1 will be used for the hitbox, making the hitbox a sphere

hit3_DmyPoly2.Wiki: ID of second dummypoly location to use for hitbox 3 (4th). If -1, only DmyPoly1 will be used for the hitbox, making the hitbox a sphere

atkPhysCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies physical damage of attack source, such as a weapon

atkMagCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies magic damage of attack source, such as a weapon

atkFireCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies fire damage of attack source, such as a weapon

atkThunCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies lightning damage of attack source, such as a weapon

atkStamCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies stamina damage of attack source, such as a weapon

guardAtkRateCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies deflection attack value of attack source, such as a weapon. Compared against deflection defense to determine if this attack should bounce

guardBreakCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies deflection defense of guard source, such as a shield. Compared against deflection attack value to determine if the attack should bounce

atkSuperArmorCorrection.Wiki: Multiplies poise damage of attack source, such as a weapon

guardAtkRate.Wiki: Flat deflection damage. Compared against deflection defense value to determine if this attack should bounce.

guardBreakRate.Wiki: Flat deflection defense. Compared against deflection attack value to determine if the attack should bounce.

atkObj.Wiki: If an object has less object HP than the attack has object damage, the object will break.

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies stability when this attack is used for blocking.\n-50 = -50%% stability, 50 = +50%% stability

isGhostAtk.Wiki: true = attacks can harm new londo ghosts

Self.Wiki: Governs hitboxes and damage of attacks
